name: Coppercube Animation
description:
A quick storyboard draft of the intro animation for the Cas-Evac game I'm making with Ambiera Coppercube - a remake of the classic  64kb retro game: "Amaurote".

This is one of the final drafts for the intro animation - just to test the camera-framing, timing and audio. The final animation will probably feature different models, music, sounds and scene and will be rotoscoped, to give it a more artistic  cinematic feel.

This was the first thing I ever produced when I first downloaded coppercube a few years ago - there was a lot of learning andtril/error involved. Took around a week to finish - I expect the final version of the animation will be a bit more polished/finished.
